sentences.en: Democracy is incompatible with excessive, bureaucratic regimentation of social life.
sentences.cn: 民主与受到过度的、官僚化的管制的社会生活是不相容的。

sentences.en: Discipline without regimentation was Miss Bulstrode's motto.
sentences.cn: 既注意纪律,又不造成一律化,这就是布尔斯特罗德小姐的座右铭.

sentences.en: Expounded the concept of the member regimentation.
sentences.cn: 提出了对业主实行“会员制”的经营管理模式的概念.

sentences.en: Matters concerning regimentation, development, and administration of community areas.
sentences.cn: 二三关于社区编定 、 开发及管理事项.

sentences.en: They don't want equality and regimentation.
sentences.cn: 他们不要一律平等和严密的组织.

sentences.en: Using the imported special antirust paint prevents desquamation and regimentation.
sentences.cn: 采用进口特殊防锈涂料防止脱皮和类别.

words.tran_cn: 纪律；系统化；严格控制；团的编制

trans.tran_cn: 编组团队，组织化，系统化
trans.tran_en: Regimentation is very strict control over the way a group of people behave or the way something is done
